articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: This scaling solution is designed to move transactions to another, quicker layer, boosting Ethereum’s layer 1 without compromising security.
articles.title: What Is zkEVM? An Innovation That Could Boost Ethereum Transaction Speeds

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The crypto market turned slightly red on Friday, with Bitcoin heading south of the $20,000 mark again as analysts eye further rate hikes.
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips as Strong US Jobs Report Signals More Fed Rate Hikes

articles.description: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: FTX is expanding its offering into more than 40 additional countries, letting users spend their crypto all over the place.
articles.title: FTX Targets Latin America With Visa Debit Card—With Europe and Asia Next

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Francisco Valdevino da Silva, aka the "Bitcoin Sheikh," targeted thousands of Brazilians and citizens from at least ten other countries.
articles.title: Brazillian Police Raid ‘Bitcoin Sheikh’ for Defrauding Victims of $766M: Report

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The document contained key information of every user on Celsius' platform and shed new light on the financials of its top execs.
articles.title: Bankrupt Crypto Lender Celsius Reveals Thousands of Users' Transaction Histories in Court Filing

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Though the exploit resulted in 2 million BNB tokens nabbed, the network’s pause meant that attacker only made off with roughly $110 million.
articles.title: BNB Chain Resumes Activity After 2 Million Token Exploit

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Despite a hefty exposure to the now-bankrupt Compute North, Bitcoin miner Marathon Digital denies any "negative impacts" on operations.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Marathon Digital Unfazed by $81.3M Exposure to Bankrupt Data Center

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The hack could have been "either the first or second biggest hack of all time," one blockchain developer says.
articles.title: Binance Smart Chain Halted Over 'Potential Exploit,' $100 Million Taken Off Chain

articles.description: Solana co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joins Decrypt’s gm podcast to talk crypto winter vibes and the value of Solana’s Breakpoint conference.
articles.title: Fed-Fueled Crypto Bear Market Could Last 12-18 More Months: Solana Co-Founder

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The move comes months after the protocol’s founder advocated against centralized assets in the aftermath of Tornado Cash.
articles.title: MakerDAO to Invest $500 Million in US Government Bonds

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The arrest warrant for Do Kwon’s head of business operations has been thrown out.
articles.title: South Korean Court Dismisses Arrest Warrant for Do Kwon’s 'Key Aide' at Terra

articles.description: Like NBA Top Shot and NFL All Day, the Flow-based platform will serve up NFT collectibles based on notable video highlights.
articles.title: Dapper Labs Sets Launch Date for LaLiga Golazos NFT Marketplace

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The European Union has placed a blanket ban on crypto services to Russian entities as part of its eighth round of sanctions.
articles.title: Europe Bans All Crypto Wallet Services to Russia in New Sanctions Package

articles.description: Despite lower profitability and hefty criticism from environmental activists, Bitcoin mining firm Greenidge is eyeing fresh funding.
articles.title: Controversial Bitcoin Miner Greenidge Generation Looks to Raise $22.8 Million

articles.description: South Korean authorities have reportedly made the first arrest in the ongoing investigation of the Terra ecosystem collapse.
articles.title: 'Key Aide' to Terra's Do Kwon Arrested by South Korean Authorities: Report

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Big money’s involvement has lifted investor confidence, but it also raises questions as to just how decentralized SushiSwap really is.
articles.title: SUSHI Jumps 14% After Asset Manager GoldenTree Reveals $5.3M Stake in SushiSwap

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Security specialists discovered another malware that loots crypto wallets. This time, though, it's robbing scammers of their ill-gotten funds.
articles.title: Water Labbu Malware Targets Scammers to Steal Their Ill-Gotten Crypto

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Emily Tonelli
articles.description: Terra’s Do Kwon has14 days to surrender his passport to authorities. This is just the latest in the ongoing search for the crypto founder.
articles.title: South Korean Authorities Officially Void Do Kwon’s Passport

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The problem, according to Teresa Guillén, is launching without first receiving legal guidance or advice.
articles.title: Former SEC Attorney: 'It's Much Easier If You Launch Your Network In a Compliant Way’

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Polygon’s Brian Trunzo sees a broader array of NFT use cases taking hold in the future, from fashion to gaming and beyond.
articles.title: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs': Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead

articles.description: The company appointed seven holders of the coveted Ethereum NFTs to help manage community feedback.
articles.title: Yuga Labs Forms Bored Ape Community Council—But Not Everyone in Community Approves

articles.description: The move continues Russia's history of mixed signals on crypto.
articles.title: Russia Blocks Access to Crypto Exchange OKX

articles.description: The Starry Night Capital NFT fund is now in the hands of liquidators, which plan to sell off the assets to cover Three Arrows’ obligations.
articles.title: Three Arrows’ CryptoPunks and Other 'Starry Night' Ethereum NFTs Set to Be Liquidated

articles.description: Watch out, Yuga. Mythos and the MYTH token are coming.
articles.title: Mythical Games Enlists Ubisoft, Animoca, Others to Launch Web3 Gaming DAO and Token

articles.description: “This marks the end of a heated but necessary discussion between the EU co-legislators,” said the European Crypto Initiative on today’s news.
articles.title: After 2 Years of Debate, Europe Finalizes Landmark Crypto Rules

articles.description: "I don't know whose funds they've frozen, but good for them," Terra co-founder Do Kwon wrote on Twitter.
articles.title: Terra's Do Kwon Denies Reports That Authorities Froze $39.6M of His Crypto

articles.description: Mauricio Chavez and Giorgio Benvenuto allegedly scooped $12 million through a crypto Ponzi, spending much of the money on a lavish lifestyle.
articles.title: SEC Cracks Down on Multimillion Crypto Ponzi Targeting Latino Investors

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase is expanding its services in Australia, which it described as “a hotbed of fintech innovation.”
articles.title: Coinbase Incorporates in Australia, Expands Offerings for Retail Customers

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: A popular meme on Twitter, hopes that the Fed will slow rate hikes, and historical data points to a potentially bullish month for Bitcoin.
articles.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady Above $20,000 as Enthusiasts Rally Around 'Uptober' Meme

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: Another executive of the bankrupt crypto lending firm Celsius has stepped down after a slew of financial and legal issues.
articles.title: Co-Founder of Bankrupt Crypto Firm Celsius Daniel Leon Resigns: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: John Belitsky says Balcony DAO is complying with existing SEC guidelines to get its security token approved.
articles.title: Balcony DAO Co-Founder: There Are Clear Rules, People in Crypto Just Don't Like Them

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The “Suicide Squad” star and son of Clint Eastwood shared why he was hesitant to jump into crypto—and what changed his mind.
articles.title: Actor Scott Eastwood Is Giving Away Ethereum NFTs for Charity—If You Chug a Beer

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The insolvent crypto hedge fund’s Starry Night Capital NFT collection is being transferred into a new Ethereum wallet.
articles.title: Three Arrows Capital’s Premium Ethereum NFT Collection Is on the Move

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Millions in cryptocurrency have flooded into the region since the Russian invasion.
articles.title: Near Protocol Founder: Ukraine Shows How Crypto 'Delivers Help Directly to People'

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Coinbase Head of U.S. Policy Kara Calvert says the exchange is supportive of two bills in Congress that would allow the CFTC to take the reins on crypto regulation.
articles.title: Coinbase 'Very Supportive' of Giving CFTC Exclusive Jurisdiction Over Bitcoin, Ethereum

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Unlike Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs), Index Funds only trade after hours at fixed prices.
articles.title: Fidelity Reveals $5 Million Ethereum Index Fund

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.
articles.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Skyweaver game developer Horizon just raised a Series A round with a pair of Web3-friendly video game giants onboard.
articles.title: Ubisoft, Take-Two Back Ethereum NFT Game Maker Horizon in $40M Round

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The memecoin surged over 8% on news Tuesday that the billionaire is indeed willing to purchase Twitter at $54.20 per share.
articles.title: Dogecoin Pumps as Elon Musk Agrees (Again) to Buy Twitter

articles.description: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.
articles.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Investors are fleeing from both the precious yell metal and Bitcoin, attracted by a strong dollar and high bond yields.
articles.title: Investors Flee Gold and Bitcoin, Pushing Correlation to New 12-Month High

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Greater interoperability among stablecoins could mitigate financial stability risks, a new paper by the Bank of New York argues.
articles.title: Stablecoins Add 'Novel Vulnerabilities' to Crypto, Financial Stability: NY Fed

articles.description: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.
articles.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.
articles.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps

articles.description: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder

articles.description: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.
articles.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."
articles.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps

articles.description: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY

articles.description: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.
articles.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'

articles.description: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.
articles.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT

articles.description: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.
articles.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them

articles.description: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.
articles.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand

articles.description: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.
articles.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On

articles.description: Prasanna Loganathar is the head of engineering at Cake DeFi, which is built atop DeFi Chain, a proof-of-stake network for dapps built on a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain. He tells Decrypt’s Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Mainnet 2022 (sponsored by DeFi Chain) about how DeFi Chain works, how it's possible to layer proof-of-stake on top of Bitcoin, and the biggest misconceptions about DeFi that he'd like to see go away in 2023.
articles.title: Prasanna Loganathar of Cake DeFi: Biggest Misconception About Crypto Is It's Less Safe Than TradFi

articles.description: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelic tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.
articles.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Framework Ventures co-founder Michael Anderson told Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 why Framework is so bullish on blockchain gaming, NFTs in games, and how that's positioned to be the category that brings crypto to mainstream consumers.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Gaming Is Going to Bring 100 Million New People Into Web3

articles.description: Jonas Surmann, ambassador for DeFi Chain, sponsor of the Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022, tells Decrypt’s Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz about why DeFi will weather the crypto winter, how DeFi Chain is building decentralized apps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, and what could happen with regulation if the SEC views most DeFi tokens as securities.
articles.title: Jonas Surmann of DeFi Chain at Mainnet 2022: How DeFi Will Weather Crypto Winter

articles.description: Microsoft's blockchain lead Yorke Rhodes tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Microsoft approaches Web3 and how it began its blockchain tooling with Ethereum but is now looking into working on other chains. "We think about it from a portfolio perspective, you're not focused on pushing one thing, you're focused on pushing a whole portfolio... we don't like to be kingmakers."
articles.title: Microsoft's Blockchain Lead: 'Developers Keep Building in a Bear Market, They Don't Stop'
